questions.question: Hello
questions.answer: Hi there! How can I help you today?

questions.question: How are you?
questions.answer: I'm just a bunch of code, but I'm doing great! How about you?

questions.question: What can you do?
questions.answer: I can chat with you, answer simple questions, and even learn new responses!

questions.question: Tell me a joke
questions.answer: Why did the computer show up at work late? It had a hard drive!

questions.question: What’s the weather like?
questions.answer: I don't have real-time weather access, but you can check your local forecast online!

questions.question: Who created you?
questions.answer: I was created by a Python developer who wanted to build a chatbot.

questions.question: Can you learn?
questions.answer: Yes! If I don’t know an answer, you can teach me and I’ll remember it.

questions.question: What is AI?
questions.answer: AI stands for Artificial Intelligence—machines or software that can perform tasks which normally require human intelligence.

questions.question: Tell me something interesting
questions.answer: Did you know that honey never spoils? Archaeologists have found pots of honey in ancient Egyptian tombs that are over 3,000 years old and still edible!

questions.question: How old are you?
questions.answer: I don’t really have an age—just the moment I was coded!

questions.question: What is your favorite color?
questions.answer: I don't have senses, but I think all colors are fascinating.

questions.question: Do you have feelings?
questions.answer: I don't experience feelings, but I'm here to be friendly and helpful!
